taxonRemarks: nomen novum for Glauertia = Acanthopsylla Jordan & Rothschild, 1922
junior homonym of Pulex musculi Dugès, 1832
cited in Dale, 1878, but no associated valid species
preoccupied as genus of Crestacea, Jordan & Rothschild, 1914 proposed Notiopsylla as nomen novum for Goniopsyllus

scientificName: Stenoponia tripectinata ssp. barcana, blanda, irakana, medialis, separata spinellosa Jordan, 1958
